channel.title: Unable to ping my router?
channel.description:
Hey mopar, so i have just changed my ISP, with it i now have the BT Home Hub 3.0, and i cant connect to my server, ive portfowarded
[IMG]http://i904.photobucket.com/albums/ac247/dalenuttall7/portchecker.jpg[/img]
i was wondering if the ping was the problem if so please let me know how to fix ?
Thanks.
